column1:

column1:
Please make sure Sort By "Position" is selected in the following setting group: STORES -> 
                                  Configuration -> Improved Layered Navigation: Brands -> Brand Slider
column2:
Please make sure Sort By "Position" is selected in the following setting group: STORES ->

column1:
Please select brand attribute in Stores -> Configuration -> Amasty Extensions -> Improved Layered Navigation:
                    Brands.
column2:
Please select brand attribute in Stores -> Configuration -> Amasty Extensions -> Improved Layered Navigation:
                    Brands.

column1: Creates SEO-friendly brand pages. Every page contains all your products filtered by particular brand and contains unique content that you assigned for the option of brand attribute.
column2: Creates SEO-friendly brand pages. Every page contains all your products filtered by particular brand and contains unique content that you assigned for the option of brand attribute.

column1: Adds a key before brand name in URL like /[key]/brand-name.html
column2: Adds a key before brand name in URL like /[key]/brand-name.html

column1: Please make sure the CMS page is enabled (Content -> Elements -> Pages)
column2: Please make sure the CMS page is enabled (Content -> Elements -> Pages)
